homePage.heroTitle: Transform Your Vision into a Real Project with Quality, Reliability, and On-Time Delivery
homePage.heroClientsTitle: We Have Worked With More Than
homePage.whoWeAreDescription: Waslah Mi'mar Contracting Company is a leading and specialized company in providing innovative and high-quality architectural solutions and general contracting. We work to meet our clients' needs by executing diverse projects with professionalism and expertise. Our team consists of experts in the fields of engineering, construction, and project management. We guarantee project execution on time and within a suitable budget, always striving to achieve the highest levels of quality and safety. We aim to achieve client satisfaction and exceed their expectations.
homePage.projectsSubTitle: To view all our projects, download them from here
homePage.visionDescription: In the execution of our projects, we rely on an integrated system containing all specializations distributed across main departments and at the required level of quality, while continuously developing our services and works. This is in order to serve the projects and complete them on time, always with the training of the work team according to the highest quality standards to keep pace with the Kingdom's Vision 2030 and to be a contributing hand in its achievement.
homePage.missionDescription: General contracting and construction works for buildings, where we aspire to always be the high-trust entity that clients turn to for the execution of all their projects. We aim to always be a trusted partner for clients, leveraging global technological developments to ensure execution quality and fast delivery for our clients.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: At Waslah Mi'mar Contracting Company, we provide a comprehensive range of engineering and execution services, including the preparation of architectural, structural, electrical, and mechanical designs, and the execution of industrial, residential, commercial, and warehouse projects. We also prepare execution drawings, technical specifications, and timelines. Additionally, we provide full engineering supervision and project management services according to the highest quality standards, with project execution and delivery on a turnkey basis to ensure speed of completion and accuracy of execution. Our specialized engineering team works to execute each project professionally and with the highest degree of commitment to quality and time.

servicesLogo.title: Construction Works
servicesLogo.description: We execute all earthworks, including rebar and concrete pouring for industrial, commercial, and residential buildings. We also supervise the installation of steel buildings and precast structures with high precision to ensure the safety and stability of the structural framework.

servicesLogo.title: Building Finishing and Fit-out
servicesLogo.description: We provide finishing services for high-end projects, including plastering, flooring, suspended ceiling installation, carpentry work, painting and glazing, in addition to ordering and installing furnishings according to the approved design and specifications for each project.

servicesLogo.title: Electrical Works
servicesLogo.description: We provide integrated electrical works including power distribution, lighting systems, earthing systems, and the implementation of low-voltage systems, ensuring operational efficiency and electrical system safety.

servicesLogo.title: Mechanical Works
servicesLogo.description: We specialize in designing and implementing ventilation and air conditioning systems, in addition to water supply and drainage works, and installing firefighting systems according to approved engineering standards.

servicesLogo.title: Infrastructure
servicesLogo.description: We execute infrastructure works including building stations, installing pipes and underground tanks, road paving and asphalting, and installing lighting poles, to ensure the site's readiness for construction and operation.

servicesLogo.title: Specialized Construction
servicesLogo.description: We provide building solutions specifically designed for specialized purposes such as cold stores, refrigerated rooms, fortified rooms, and warehouses with high-rise vertical storage systems, focusing on the technical specifications for each type of these facilities.

servicesLogo.title: Engineering Design
servicesLogo.description: An international technical support office in Cairo, consisting of an engineering team headed by Dr. Mohamed El-Shahat, to prepare design drawings, execution drawings, technical specifications, timelines, and all that is necessary to ensure quality achievement.

documents.title: Our Documents
documents.description: Waslah Mi'mar Contracting Company is committed to providing all official documents that reflect its professionalism and commitment to quality standards. These documents include licenses and commercial registrations, classification and qualification certificates, quality certificates, as well as contracts, technical offers, execution drawings, and supervision and technical follow-up reports. We also periodically update our documents to comply with the requirements of official authorities in the Kingdom. Concerned parties can request to view these documents by contacting our specialized team through the 'Contact Us' page.

docs.title: Commercial Registration
docs.description: The official document proving the company's registration with the Ministry of Commerce in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, including the registration number, commercial activity, and issue and expiry dates.

docs.title: Tax Certificate
docs.description: Certifies that Waslah Mi'mar Contracting Company is registered with the General Authority of Zakat and Tax and Customs in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

docs.title: National Address
docs.description: The official location of Waslah Mi'mar Contracting Company according to the approved national address: P.O. Box - Riyadh - Industrial City - Second Gate - Plot No. 344.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.description: At Waslah Mi'mar Contracting Company, we pride ourselves on executing a variety of projects in multiple sectors, including factories of various activities, warehouses, residential and commercial buildings, in addition to real estate development projects in cooperation with official entities such as the Saudi Authority for Industrial Cities and Zones (MODON) and the Riyadh Municipality. Our projects focus on combining quality, timely commitment, and execution accuracy, supported by a specialized engineering team that strives to provide integrated solutions that meet client aspirations and keep pace with the Kingdom's Vision 2030.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Waslah Mi'mar Contracting Company is a leading and specialized company in providing innovative and high-quality architectural solutions and general contracting. We work to meet our clients' needs by executing diverse projects with professionalism and expertise. Our team consists of experts in the fields of engineering, construction, and project management. We guarantee project execution on time and within a suitable budget, always striving to achieve the highest levels of quality and safety. We aim to achieve client satisfaction and exceed their expectations.
about.founderDescription: The founder of Waslah Mi'mar Company is Eng. Mohamed El-Shahat, a specialized engineer who holds a degree in Engineering from Cairo University. He held several senior management positions in contracting companies before founding the company, which he leads with an ambitious vision aimed at pioneering in the field of engineering design and execution.

items.title: International Technical Support Office in Cairo
items.description: Consisting of an engineering team headed by Dr. Amr El-Banna to prepare design drawings, execution drawings, technical specifications, control schedules, and all that is necessary for comprehensive quality achievement.

items.title: Contribution to the Industrial Revolution
items.description: We seek to contribute effectively to the industrial revolution in line with the Kingdom's Vision 2030 by participating in the design and execution works for factories and warehouses in all their diverse activities for more than 120 factories in cooperation with the Saudi Authority for Industrial Cities and Zones (MODON) and technology zones.

items.title: Contribution to Real Estate Development
items.description: We seek to contribute effectively to real estate development in line with the Kingdom's Vision 2030 by participating in the design and execution works for residential and commercial complexes, all legitimate activities in cooperation with the Riyadh Municipality.

items.title: Work Team of 35 Members
items.description: Consisting of an engineering team headed by Dr. Amr El-Banna to prepare design drawings, execution drawings, technical specifications, timelines, and all that is necessary to ensure quality achievement.
